languages.text: {n}Паскаль запрокидывает голову, и мощь, переполнявшая его голос, выплескивается вовне. Голос техножреца гремит на весь корабль, подхваченный каждым вокс-динамиком каждой палубы.{/n} "Однажды я нарушил заветы Омниссии. Преступил границы, проложенные для познания. Я содеял грех. Все мы содеяли".

{n}Pasqal throws back his head, and the power brimming in his voice rushes forth like a flood. The Tech-Priest's booming voice is heard throughout the ship, echoed by every vox-speaker on every deck.{/n} "I once broke the Omnissiah's tenets. I overstepped the limits placed on knowledge. I was guilty of a transgression. We all were."
languages.original_text: {n}Паскаль запрокидывает голову, и мощь, переполнявшая его голос, выплескивается вовне. Голос техножреца гремит на весь корабль, подхваченный каждым вокс-динамиком каждой палубы.{/n} "Однажды я нарушил заветы Омниссии. Преступил границы, проложенные для познания. Я содеял грех. Все мы содеяли".

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal throws back his head, and the power his voice has been brimming with overflows and rushes forth like a flood. The Tech-Priest's booming voice is heard throughout the ship, echoed by every vox-speaker on every deck.{/n} "I once broke the Omnissiah's tenets. I overstepped the limits He had set for knowledge. I was guilty of a sin. We all were."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}パスカルは頭をのけぞらせると、あふれんばかりの力を込めた声を洪水のようにとめどなく発する。技術司祭の声は船中に響き渡り、全デッキの全ヴォクス・スピーカーにこだまする。{/n}「自分はかつて、万機神の教義に背いた。知識に課せられた制限を越えてしまったのだ。自分は涜神の罪を犯した。我々全員の罪だ」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal throws back his head, and the power brimming in his voice rushes forth like a flood. The Tech-Priest's booming voice is heard throughout the ship, echoed by every vox-speaker on every deck.{/n} "I once broke the Omnissiah's tenets. I overstepped the limits placed on knowledge. I was guilty of a transgression. We all were."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルは頭をのけぞらせると、あふれんばかりの力を込めた声を洪水のようにとめどなく発する。技術司祭の声は船中に響き渡り、全デッキの全ヴォクス・スピーカーにこだまする。{/n}「自分はかつて、万機神の教義に背いた。知識に課せられた制限を越えてしまったのだ。自分は涜神の罪を犯した。我々全員の罪だ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡仰起头来，声音中的力量像洪水一样磅礴而出。技术神甫洪亮的声音响彻全舰，回荡在每个甲板的音阵装置中。{/n}“我曾违背了欧姆尼塞亚的信条，超越了知识的极限。我犯下了罪行，我们都犯了罪。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal throws back his head, and the power brimming in his voice rushes forth like a flood. The Tech-Priest's booming voice is heard throughout the ship, echoed by every vox-speaker on every deck.{/n} "I once broke the Omnissiah's tenets. I overstepped the limits placed on knowledge. I was guilty of a transgression. We all were."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡仰起头来，声音中的力量像洪水一样磅礴而出。技术祭司洪亮的声音响彻全舰，回荡在每个甲板的音阵装置中。{/n}“我曾违背了欧姆尼塞亚的信条，超越了知识的极限。我犯下了罪行，我们都犯了罪。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal rejette la tête en arrière et toute la puissance de sa voix se déverse dans le vaisseau telle une inondation, relayée par les synthétiseurs-vox sur tous les ponts.{/n} « Par le passé, j'ai trahi les principes de l'Omnimessie. J'ai outrepassé les limites de la connaissance. Je me suis rendu coupable de transgression. Nous nous sommes tous rendus coupables de transgression. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal throws back his head, and the power brimming in his voice rushes forth like a flood. The Tech-Priest's booming voice is heard throughout the ship, echoed by every vox-speaker on every deck.{/n} "I once broke the Omnissiah's tenets. I overstepped the limits placed on knowledge. I was guilty of a transgression. We all were."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal rejette la tête en arrière et toute la puissance de sa voix se déverse dans le vaisseau telle une inondation, relayée par les synthétiseurs-vox sur tous les ponts.{/n} « Par le passé, j'ai trahi les principes de l'Omnimessie. J'ai outrepassé les limites de la connaissance. Je me suis rendu coupable de transgression. Nous nous sommes tous rendus coupables de transgression. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal echa la cabeza hacia atrás y el poder que emana de su voz fluye como un torrente de agua. La voz atronadora del tecnosacerdote se escucha en toda la nave, resonando en todos los altavoces de voco de la cubierta.{/n} «Ya he incumplido los principios del Omnissiah. He sobrepasado los límites del conocimiento. Soy culpable de cometer una transgresión. Todos lo somos».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal throws back his head, and the power brimming in his voice rushes forth like a flood. The Tech-Priest's booming voice is heard throughout the ship, echoed by every vox-speaker on every deck.{/n} "I once broke the Omnissiah's tenets. I overstepped the limits placed on knowledge. I was guilty of a transgression. We all were."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal echa la cabeza hacia atrás y el poder que emana de su voz fluye como un torrente de agua. La voz atronadora del tecnosacerdote se escucha en toda la nave, resonando en todos los altavoces de voco de la cubierta.{/n} «Ya he incumplido los principios del Omnissiah. He sobrepasado los límites del conocimiento. Soy culpable de cometer una transgresión. Todos lo somos».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal legt den Kopf in den Nacken, und die Kraft in seiner Stimme ergießt sich wie eine Flut. Die dröhnende Stimme des Techpriesters ist auf dem gesamten Schiff zu hören, hallt aus jedem Vox-Lautsprecher auf jedem Deck.{/n} "Ich habe einst die Grundsätze des Omnissiah verletzt. Ich habe die Grenzen des Wissens übertreten. Ich war einer Sünde schuldig. Wir alle waren das."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal throws back his head, and the power brimming in his voice rushes forth like a flood. The Tech-Priest's booming voice is heard throughout the ship, echoed by every vox-speaker on every deck.{/n} "I once broke the Omnissiah's tenets. I overstepped the limits placed on knowledge. I was guilty of a transgression. We all were."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal legt den Kopf in den Nacken, und die Kraft in seiner Stimme ergießt sich wie eine Flut. Die dröhnende Stimme des Techpriesters ist auf dem gesamten Schiff zu hören, hallt aus jedem Vox-Lautsprecher auf jedem Deck.{/n} "Ich habe einst die Grundsätze des Omnissiah verletzt. Ich habe die Grenzen des Wissens übertreten. Ich war einer Sünde schuldig. Wir alle waren das."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Başını geriye atan Pasqal'ın sesinden taşan kudret, sel misali yayılıyor. Tekno Rahip'in bütün güvertelerdeki voks hoparlörlerinde yankılanan gür sesi, geminin her yerinde duyuluyor.{/n} "Bir zamanlar Hermesih'in ilkelerine karşı gelmiştim. İrfan üzerine koyulan sınırlılıkların ötesine adım atmıştım. Sınırı aşma suçu işlemiştim. Hepimiz işlemiştik."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal throws back his head, and the power brimming in his voice rushes forth like a flood. The Tech-Priest's booming voice is heard throughout the ship, echoed by every vox-speaker on every deck.{/n} "I once broke the Omnissiah's tenets. I overstepped the limits placed on knowledge. I was guilty of a transgression. We all were."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal başını geriye atıyor ve sesinden taşan kudret, bir sel gibi yayılıyor. Tekno Rahip'in gürleyen sesi bütün güvertelerdeki bütün voks hoperlörlerde yankılanıyor, gemi boyunca duyuluyor.{/n} "Bir zamanlar Hermesih'in ilkelerine karşı gelmiştim. İrfan üzerine koyulan sınırlılıkların ötesine adım atmıştım. Sınırı aşma suçu işlemiştim. Hepimiz işlemiştik."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
